even

well lets do it! lets find out. lets post a messeage asking whos
where, beause in the member list some people just don't put it or never
set up there profiles. so lets make it happend. this is kind how the
orginal Shinsengumi started the clan up. so lets give it a try.

messages.subject: Gathering
messages.msgSnippet: it would be cool to have a gathering of members. we can meet in a japanese bar and just have fun. it doesn t have to be all of us in one place because we all
messages.messageBody:
it would be cool to have a gathering of members. we can meet in a
japanese bar and just have fun. it doesn't have to be all of us in one
place because we all live in different places of the world. so we set a
date and everyone in there area meets up in the bar/restaurant and hang
out. we can take pictures and put them in the group photos. we can
dress up and just get to know the people in our clan. there should be a
daiymo for each area so it can get organized right. what do you
samurais think?
